# 斯坦福 CS183c 闪电式扩张中文笔记

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/sitanfu-cs183c-shandianshi-kuozhang-zhongwen-biji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/sitanfu-cs183c-shandianshi-kuozhang-zhongwen-biji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install sitanfu-cs183c-shandianshi-kuozhang-zhongwen-biji
sitanfu-cs183c-shandianshi-kuozhang-zhongwen-biji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g sitanfu-csyibasanc-shandianshi-kuozhang-zhongwen-biji
sitanfu-csyibasanc-shandianshi-kuozhang-zhongwen-biji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
